items.prompt: DO NOT START ENGINE WITH OIL TEMP < -13F (-20C) OR AMBIENT TEMP > 120F (50C)
IF OIL PRESSURE IS NOT VALID WITHIN 10 SEC, TURN OFF ENGINE IMMEDIATELY
THROTTLE SHOULD REMAIN < 2500 RPM UNTIL OIL TEMP > 122F (50C)
RUNWAY ENVIRONMENT IN SIGHT BEFORE MAP
RUNWAY ENVIRONMENT NOT IN SIGHT AT MAP
RUNWAY ENVIRONMENT IN SIGHT BEFORE MAP
RUNWAY ENVIRONMENT NOT IN SIGHT AT MAP
RUNWAY ENVIRONMENT IN SIGHT BEFORE MAP
RUNWAY ENVIRONMENT NOT IN SIGHT AT MAP
IF LANE LIGHT PERSISTS, ASSUME ALTERNATOR FAILURE
Expect systems failure when battery voltage drops below 10V. This includes the ECU and Fuel Pumps, which will result in engine failure.
The engine can run from the main battery for approximately 30 mins, following a dual alternator failure; from a full charge with all ancillary equipment turned off.
